extendedInfo.description: The official Android Mobile App for Leicester's Summer Sundae Festival. All the latest news and information, schedules, and artist listings.

reviews.title: Won\'t install
reviews.comment: Simply fails to install on an ICS Galaxy S2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s massive for what you get. No move to SD. Not much there to make me think I will keep it. Oh, with it just sitting on my phone its taking 12.83mb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phone memory only and Bloatware
reviews.comment: Off to the festival at the weekend so thought I\'d try this. First issue is that it only installs on the phone memory. Next issue is that it is a massive 9 meg on install and seems to get bigger! On my HTC Desire it has sat at Updating Listings for the last 10 mins (possibly because it has filled the phone memory) the app is now using 10.5 meg of limted phone memory. Please can it be updated to allow install on the SD card prior to the weekend as this would make it more usable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Big but no issue for me as using a galaxy s2. Listings app appears a bit buggy but overall it does the job. Move to SD option for older phones a must
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really useful during the festival. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Should have labelled the indoor stage and merch stall on the map!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete Rewrite for 2012
reviews.comment: We\'ve slimmed down the app for 2012 - focussing on the key features such as listings and maps. You should find it much more responsive this year.
reviews.author: A Google User
